Class IndexFilesWeb

java.lang.Object
  patrilex.IndexFilesWeb

public class IndexFilesWeb
extends java.lang.Object

Class providing functions for managing the index.

Constructor Detail

IndexFilesWeb

public IndexFilesWeb()
Method Detail

createIndex

public void createIndex(java.lang.Boolean verbose)
Method createIndex Creates a new index. The index is created at the location specified as IndexLocation in the constants class. It is created from the documents specified as DocsLocation in the constants class. If the parameter 'verbose' is true, the path of every document that is indexed is printed out.

indexDocs

private void indexDocs(java.io.File file,
                       java.lang.Boolean verbose)
                throws java.lang.Exception
Method indexDocs Indexes documents for a newly created index. Only documents ending in .html, .htm, .txt and .pdf are considered.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

updateIndex

public void updateIndex(java.lang.Boolean verbose)
Method updateIndex Updates an index. The index must be at the location specified as IndexLocation in the constants class. It is created from the documents specified as DocsLocation in the constants class. If the parameter 'verbose' is true, the path of every document that is deleted or added is printed out.

updateDocs

private void updateDocs(java.io.File file,
                        java.lang.Boolean verbose)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

makeTextDocument

private org.apache.lucene.document.Document makeTextDocument(java.io.File file)
                                                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Method makeTextDocument Creates a Document out of a text file. path: path of file modified: modification date uid: uid contents: contents of the file summary: first 50 lines title: filename without termination

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException

makeHTMLDocument

private org.apache.lucene.document.Document makeHTMLDocument(java.io.File file)
                                                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Method makeHTMLDocument Creates a Document out of a HTML file. path: path of file modified: modification date uid: uid contents: raw contents of the file summary: first 200 characters of raw text title: HTML Tag <P> <DD><DL> <DT><B>Throws:</B> <DD><CODE>java.io.FileNotFoundException</CODE></DL> </DD> </DL> <HR> <A NAME="makePDFDocument(java.io.File)"><!-- --></A><H3> makePDFDocument</H3> <PRE> private org.apache.lucene.document.Document <B>makePDFDocument</B>(java.io.File file) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException</PRE> <DL> <DD>Method makePDFDocument Creates a Document out of a PDF file. path: path of file modified: modification date uid: uid contents: raw contents of the file summary: first 500 characters of content title: filename without termination <P> <DD><DL> <DT><B>Throws:</B> <DD><CODE>java.io.FileNotFoundException</CODE></DL> </DD> </DL> <HR> <A NAME="makeDocument(java.io.File, java.io.Reader, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)"><!-- --></A><H3> makeDocument</H3> <PRE> private org.apache.lucene.document.Document <B>makeDocument</B>(java.io.File file, java.io.Reader contents, java.lang.String summary, java.lang.String title)</PRE> <DL> <DD>Method makeDocument Creates a Document with different fields. path: stored, indexed, not analyzed modified: stored, indexed, not analyzed uid: not stored, indexed, not analyzed contents: not stored, indexed, tokenized summary: stored, not indexed title: stored, indexed, tokenized <P> <DD><DL> </DL> </DD> </DL> <HR> <A NAME="uid(java.io.File)"><!-- --></A><H3> uid</H3> <PRE> private java.lang.String <B>uid</B>(java.io.File f)</PRE> <DL> <DD>Method uid Creates a unique ID for every file. Appends path and date into a string in such a way that lexicographic sorting gives the same results as a walk of the file hierarchy. Thus null (␀) is used both to separate directory components and to separate the path from the date. <P> <DD><DL> </DL> </DD> </DL> <HR> <A NAME="uid2url(java.lang.String)"><!-- --></A><H3>
